name: Spiers Salads
description: Fruit, veg, meat and staple boxes.SE5, SE15, SE21, SE22, SE23, SE24 (Deliveries between 8am - 12:00pm) / SE4, SE6, SE8, SE10, SE13, SE14, SE16 (Deliveries between 12:00pm - 5:00pm). Order before 6pm for next day delivery.
